message: This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute.

context: <input id="searchtext" name="q" type="text" value=" Search this site" onfocus="this.value=''">
message: This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
